prompt: Tell me about a time you managed an underperforming engineer.
Describe a difficult feedback conversation and how you handled it.
Tell me about a time you coached someone to significantly improve performance.
Describe a conflict between two team members and how you resolved it.
Tell me about a time you had to make a difficult people decision.
Describe a project where scope changed significantly mid-execution.
Tell me about a time you had to prioritize between competing initiatives.
Share an example where you delivered impact with constrained resources.
Tell me about a time you influenced cross-functional stakeholders to align on a roadmap.
Describe a situation where your team missed goals and how you responded.
Walk me through a project retrospective that changed how your team works.
Tell me about a production incident and what leadership actions you took after.
Describe a technical decision that had unexpected consequences and what you learned.
Tell me about a time you had to reverse a strategy decision.
Give an example of a project where communication breakdown hurt delivery.
Tell me about a time you led without direct authority.
Describe a decision where you balanced speed vs quality.
Tell me about a time you disagreed with senior leadership and what happened.
Share an example where you built trust with a skeptical stakeholder.
Describe a high-stakes decision you made with incomplete information.
